name: fresh Podcaster
author: freshlabs.de

sections.description:
“fresh Podcaster” is a simple yet customizable plugin to embed podcasts in your posts and pages. Just add a shortcode anywhere. You can add multiple podcasts to a single page and you can use all sorts of source formats like mp4, m4a or wav and many more. Furthermore you can customize the podcast player using CSS in the plugin settings.
There is no integrated hosting plattform, free yet non-GDPR-compliant tracking, no subscription fees or anything. It doesn’t get any simpler.
sections.installation:
AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION

  1. Go to Plugins & Add New
  2. Type “fresh Podcaster” in the search field and click “Search Plugins”
  3. Click “Install Now” to install
  4. Click “Activate”

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  1. Download a copy of the “fresh Podcaster” plugin
  2. Upload fresh Podcaster to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  4. Use the fresh Podcast menu from the sidebar
sections.faq: Plugin just launched. We haven’t been asked any question. Feel free to do so!
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

Release Date: January 11th, 2021

  • WordPress 5.7 compatibility

1.0.6

Release Date: January 11th, 2021

  • Compatibility issues fixed

1.0.5

Release Date: January 11th, 2021

  • WordPress 5.6 compatibility

1.0.4

Release Date: November 7th, 2019

  • Bugs fixed

1.0.3

Release Date: September 12th, 2019

  • configurable menu hierarchy
    In the plugin settings you can change the plugins menu position in the sidebar to either top level or second level under wordpress settings.
  • Typos fixed
  • Added Russian language support

1.0.2

Release Date: August 29th, 2019

  • Typos fixed

1.0.1

Release Date: August 29th, 2019

  • icon variables changed
  • removed plugin conflicts with Fontello

1.0.0

Release Date: August 16th, 2019

  • launched.
  • go hunt some bugs.
